body.raw:
In this guide, you will learn the tooling used in [Supabase repository](https://github.com/supabase/supabase).

# What's Tooling?
You might be wondering what tooling means. If you check out [Bulletproof React's Project Standards](https://github.com/alan2207/bulletproof-react/blob/master/docs/project-standards.md),
it describes tools such as ESLint, Prettier, Husky etc.,

Similarly, in this guide, we provide an in-depth Supabase tooling analysis.

# Supabase Tooling

Supabase is a monorepo, you will find more information about monorepo in [Project Structure](https://app.thinkthroo.com/architecture#project-structure).

For us to study the tooling used in this monorepo, we would have to study the tooling used:
1. At [root level](https://github.com/supabase/supabase)
2. In [apps in supabase monorepo.](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/tree/master/apps)
3. In [packages in supabase monorepo.](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/tree/master/packages)

Tooling might vary based on an app or packages.

## Tools used at root level:
- [.github](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/tree/master/.github)
- [.dockerignore](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/blob/master/.dockerignore)
- [.gitignore](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/blob/master/.gitignore)
- [.misspell-fixer.ignore](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/blob/master/.misspell-fixer.ignore)
- [.npmrc](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/blob/master/.npmrc)
- [.nvmrc](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/blob/master/.nvmrc)
- [.prettierignore](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/blob/master/.prettierignore)
- [.prettierrc](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/blob/master/.prettierrc)
- [.vale.ini](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/blob/master/.vale.ini)
- [Makefile](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/blob/master/Makefile)
- [babel.config.js](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/blob/master/babel.config.js)
- [package.json](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/blob/master/package.json)
- [tsconfig.json](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/blob/master/tsconfig.json)
- [turbo.json](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/blob/master/turbo.json)

## Tools used in `apps/www`:

## Tools used in `apps/studio`:

## Tools used in `apps/docs`:

## Tools used in `apps/design-system`:
